description:
Get your cockpit dialled into proper torque spec with this compact torque wrench. With its 10-20nm range, this torque wrench is great for suspension linkages, axles, pedals, and other bolts that have higher torque specifications.

  • Includes: T25, #2 Phillips, and 3, 4, 5, 6mm Allen keys
  • Take standard ¼in. bits
  • Dimensions: 5 x 2.5 x 15cm
name: MEC Torque Wrench - Range 10nm-20nm
